programme.desc: George meets a couple who bought a tiny 60s ambulance, planning to transform it into a campervan where they can cook, eat and sleep. He also meets an artist who has commissioned an incredible giant wooden floating egg to use as a work/ living space.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps Sarah and Andy find the perfect place for their whole family, including their beloved dog, Ruby, on Spains southern Costa Blanca, for their budget of £160k.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: After many enjoyable holidays to Florida over the years, Sylvester and Anthonia Swanston from West Sussex have decided now is the time for them to buy their own holiday home. Laura Hamilton is on hand to show them five properties within their budget.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The competition comes from Sheffield, and first to host is flamboyant English gent Robin Lockwood, Lord of his three bed semi. Always striving for perfection, Robin has planned his traditional British menu down to the every last detail, from the first lump of caviar to the last mouthful of syllabub. Hes even ordered some freshly shot grouse, but not all of Robins guests are as pleased with his butchered birds.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Sheffield, saucy beautician Rochelle Barrett hopes to spice things up with her Caribbean-themed meal. Rochelles menu provokes mixed reactions from her guests. Robin says its too down-market for a dinner party. Rochelles guests are also baffled by her upstairs, downstairs dress code. Later, an oven malfunction brings Rochelle close to breaking point. And as the night unfolds, Robin and Sarahs flirtatious banter turns into trading insults.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Sheffield, vegan-activist Donna Thomas hopes to impress her guests with her Japanese-themed vegan meal. Rochelle is concerned that they are in for a tame alcohol-free night, while GP Sarah has an issue with tofu, but Mark is excited about the deep fried ice-cream dessert.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The competition continues in Sheffield. Mark Feakins flamboyant background has inspired his theatrical-sounding menu, but is his food as impressive as it sounds? During dinner Sarah and Robin continue their flirtatious banter; and while Rochelle and Donna are concerned that there may be toad on the menu, Sarah comes under attack from the unusually forceful Mark.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The last to host in Sheffield is Sarah Roscoe, who hopes to win the competition with her gourmet Michelin-inspired menu. Her decision to cook veal for her main dish has not gone down well with Donna the vegan; but Rochelle is looking forward to trying the meat for the first time, despite her aversion to eating `cute and pretty animals.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Steve and Helen have travelled the world in search of the perfect holiday home and have settled on Torrox on the Costa del Sol. Scarlette Douglas does her best to help them find the right property for their £95k.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Antonia and Ross love the beautiful island of Ibiza. Having holidayed there many times, they now want their own holiday home. Can Lucy Alexander deliver their dream?

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Can a fox-red Labrador called Bear impress two would-be owners without putting his paw in it? And 88-year-old identical twins hope that pint-sized Alfie will join them at the pub.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This documentary takes viewers inside the doors of Thornhill Community Academy near Dewsbury, highlighting what happens in the secondary school. Through highlighting the diverse institution, almost exactly half White British and half British-Asian, `Educating Yorkshire provides an insight into modern school life in the UK as it follows head teacher Jonny Mitchell, who tries to build upon recent improvements in exam results among the schools students. The programme also explores the universal themes of teenage life and the student-teacher relationships that are important in a young persons formative years.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A look back at some memorable staff and patient stories. An 18-year-old motorcyclist suffers major trauma after colliding with two cars. And a 29-year-old war veteran has had an accident at the gym.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A claw hammer recovered from a bin and contaminated with the DNA of both victim and killer is the final piece of the puzzle in a complex murder investigation. When the body of a woman is found, police speak to her lodger and become increasingly suspicious of his lies and strange behaviour, including the suggestion he has been tampering with her medication. Also today, the positive identification of a burglar who photographed himself at the crime scene leads police straight to his door.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A former police station in the Sheldon district of Birmingham is collared by a developer who sees an opportunity for an ambitious project. Dion meets a seasoned developer tackling a site with 24 garages in Alcester in Worcestershire.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: David Harper is on the trail of a remarkable story - the day Buffalo Bill brought his Wild West Show to Wales.

programme.title: BBC News at One
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: BBC London News
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: BBC News at One
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Sister Boniface and the gang are horrified to discover the hallmarks of a ritualistic human sacrifice in the woods, supposedly acted out by a coven of witches.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Briony May Williams teams up with a retired Shakespeare scholar who wants to write a new chapter in the Cumbrian countryside for her £300,000 budget. Away from the house hunting, Briony visits a young couple who made their own country escape and now have a farm with over 100 acres in a tiny Cumbrian village, where they herd sheep with their beloved sheepdogs.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: JB stumbles upon a rare and valuable book collection, and JJ restores a treasured washstand. But one wrong blow with a hammer could damage a cherished piece beyond repair.

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle The Answer Run down towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face The Final Run and win the chance to take home their cash prize.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Ria Lina for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: BBC News at Six
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: BBC London News
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo and JB Gill bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

programme.title: Our Lives
programme.desc: Following four families as they compete in Scotlands haggis contest. All hail from small butcher shops and each has ambitions of winning the World Haggis Championships in Perth. We meet the butchers, see life on farms, and learn how haggis is made.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon is back in the hosts chair for the award-winning comedy panel show, with Lee Mack and David Mitchell as the lightning-quick team captains. Each week, celebrity guests reveal extraordinary stories about themselves, but are they telling the truth or making it all up? Sorting the fact from the fiction this week are guests Angellica Bell, Bob Mortimer, Suggs and Holly Willoughby.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week comes to a head with just ten cooks remaining in the competition. Success could mean a place in the semi-finals, but it will take every ounce of effort to get there.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, Film Fest serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners.

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

programme.title: BBC London News
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: Taut urban tale following a rookie cops first day of training in an elite LAPD narcotics squad headed by a veteran policeman with an extreme, often morally questionable approach to law enforcement. The shell-shocked greenhorn is left to consider whether these unorthodox methods are an abuse of power or a necessary evil in a city overrun by violent crime.

programme.desc: Coverage continues of the first evening session of the 2025 World Athletics Championships as three gold medals are handed out. programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Cornwall, the call of the sea and Steve Brown beckon a young, water-loving couple who are looking to escape to the coastal county with their young daughter. They have £620,000 to spend on their new Cornish home. Steve also gets the chance to take to the water with a sailing school who support people of all abilities to develop their nautical know-how.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: A plucky cave man and the rest of his tribe face a grave threat when Lord Nooth plans to transform their land into a giant mine. Not ready to go down without a fight, he must unite the clan in an epic quest to defeat a mighty enemy: the Bronze Age.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Motoring news and views with Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May. James compares two powerful limos, the BMW 760i and Mercedes S63 AMG.

programme.title: Easy A

programme.title: Bump
programme.desc: Things have never been worse between Santi and Oly, who arent talking to each other. In the meantime, at Pica del Sabor, Bernarditas excessive friendliness causes a lot of problems.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: After being invited to a bar crawl on Khaosan Road, Zara gets under the skin of Bangkoks notorious red light district, Soi Cowboy - but filming is swiftly shut down by local bar owners and the police. When Zara meets Mike Yu, a young British expat living a life of luxury in the Thai capital, she realises theres more to the city than meets the eye. Meanwhile, a visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law in Thailand.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: In Asias sex capital, Pattaya, Zara meets British men chasing cheap thrills, before heading to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty.

programme.desc: Izzie unearths Victorian jewellery and vintage toys, while JJ revives a gramophone. But can they raise enough money to send a foster carer and a postman on a well-deserved holiday?

programme.title: Our Lives
programme.desc: In the town of Cei Newydd the winter winds ease, the boats return to water, and the community readies itself for the return of dolphin pods. Dolphins are New Quays lifeblood. The community in New Quay is united by its passion for these creatures.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos rail travels take him to the north west corner of France, where he explores the beautiful regions of Brittany and Normandy and learns of their connections with Great Britain.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four friends and colleagues, Tim, Sam, Luke and Damien, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: London and the South East England: Mains and Puddings
programme.desc: The three talented chefs from London and south east England are halfway through their heat, and the pressure is mounting. Once again, they each serve a unique take on the brief celebrating the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: The rich fishing grounds of St Ives Bay have supported the fishermen of two ports for generations: Hayle in the east and St Ives to the west. At the heart of Hayle is the harbour, established by the Victorians and now a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antique experts David Fletcher and James Lewis put a value on the regions antiques and collectibles. David is delighted by a 1950s toy plane, whilst James finds a 1940s menu from a famous Hollywood restaurant which has been signed by some top film stars. Paul Martin visits the Mining Art Gallery in Bishop Auckland to find out why many coal miners were inspired to pick up a paintbrush.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Sian Gibson, Jean Johansson, Iain Stirling and Rav Wilding take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes the train to the medieval walled town of Conwy on the last leg of his exploration of the shores of north Wales.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson examines the remains of a lost harbour in Port Carlisle, Cumbria, a small village near Carlisle which grew as a consequence of the canal building surge that swept the nation.

programme.title: Beechgrove Garden
programme.desc: At Beechgrove Garden, Lizzie and Brian return to the project of creating a new garden in memory of presenter Jim McColl, who passed away last year. Jims favourite trees, acers, are being planted.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Monty is harvesting sweetcorn. Toby visits a magical garden in Wiltshire. Frances is in a Cornish village to find out how pioneering technology is creating beautiful borders for pollinators. A self-taught grower is transforming her allotment.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: When news of an Alaskan oil spill breaks on the day of Public Eyes launch, Helen is pressured to rethink her show format, whilst combating a brutal act of sabotage from Lindsay. Dale tries to land an interview with the PM.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: Documentary telling the unlikely story of a banished flock of stoic sheep. 200-years-ago they were turned out of their meadows on North Ronaldsay, but, deprived of grass, how on earth have they managed to survive?

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob travel to Mid Wales, to fish for wild carp in some equally wild lake locations. Theyve had success catching both mirror and common carp in previous trips, but trying to net a `Welsh wildie will require a different approach.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: Highlights of the second game of the T20 series between England and South Africa.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage from the first day of the 2025 World Athletics Championships in Tokyo.

programme.desc: The brothers help prepare for the arrival of Luka, the rare Amur Leopard. Aaron gives Shen the snow leopard cub, a health check and Kadera the jaguar rises to her challenge.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Rufus loves climbing and playing, but he isnt always able to join his friends. Rufus has leukemia and his regular hospital visits mean he often misses out on the adventures he loves. The experts create his very own adventure den.

programme.title: Absolute Genius With Dick and Dom
programme.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of Sir Joseph Bazalgette, the man who invented Londons giant sewer system. Inspired by Bazalgettes genius idea, Dick and Dom come up with their own genius idea to demonstrate the explosive power of poo.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: George the tree frog joins the doctors as they use huge catapults to investigate how the Achilles tendon works. And there is a suspected spider bite in the emergency department.

programme.title: Shark Bites
programme.desc: Steve Backshall comes face to face with the tiger shark. Diving with them in the warm waters of the Bahamas, Steve soon discovers theyll use their mouths to investigate potential food.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Danny and Micks dad Clive has turned up with his latest in a long line of `sure-fire money making schemes: washing customers cars in the car park while they use the leisure centre. The boys are happy to help and are soon scrubbing away, but when Joy finds out and demands a free wash, the boys clean her beloved old banger so hard it falls to bits. Dont worry lads, Clive knows how to fix this, or at least replace one problem with a much bigger problem.

programme.title: Andy and the Band
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Bands, Part 2
programme.desc: Emerald has deceived them, their record label has dropped them, and they are very firmly in bottom position. How will Andy and the Odd Socks defy all the odds to save Planet Rock?

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Adam and Joe take on a Mesozoic mission when Little Bro Callum challenges them to live as dinosaurs for a day. Find out if they can complete their chores while avoiding the erupting volcano.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Big Lizard is jealous of the vacuum cleaner and hides it from Dad and Cosima. Ammon decides its her new best friend, whilst Cosima reassures Big Lizard that he will always be her BFF.

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: When all the other danger agents become super-smart due to a batch of genetically enhanced celery, Danger Mouse might need to find a new job.

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: Danger Mouses attempts at gardening lead to a gigantic Welsh space plant taking over the world and an attack of intergalactic bees. Only Penfolds jam obsession can save the day!

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: When the heroes wake up on Snow Day morning, there is not a snowflake in sight. The heroes must quest to free the Snow Dragon and save Snow Day for all.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Trevor accidentally spikes himself on a cactus while questing.

programme.title: So Awkward Academy
programme.desc: Alien zombies, space monks, a demon clown, an evil knight and a world record attempt - its just another day at Cranmede Academy.

programme.title: Hetty Feather
programme.desc: Hetty Feather and her little brother Gideon are forced to leave their foster family and return to the Foundling Hospital, which fearsome Matron rules with an iron fist.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Bajau Laut people are sea nomads living in the South China Sea. When Ant and Fontaine discover their secret, theyre determined to help them.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher Unleashed!
programme.desc: Its the famous Beanotown Freewheeler Derby. During practice, the gang realise Walters go-cart is especially speedy. Worried that Walter will beat his record, Dennis creates a lighter, faster cart but loses control and injures himself.

programme.title: Ninja Express
programme.desc: To help a museum security guard who has spilt his drink over a kilt on display, the Ninjas must travel to the Highlands to compete in a tournament and win a replacement.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Whilst on a quest to return the Icicle of Destiny, Trevor topples into a cavern of tiny mushrooms who treat him like a king.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmer tells sheepdog Bitzer to clean up the sheeps field, but Bitzer soon regrets getting the sheep involved.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind lots of food supplies, but trouble ensues when its revealed that they are locked up.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: In order to avoid him spoiling the new Captain Callisto movie, the siblings have to be Gherkins servants for a week.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Spongebob becomes trapped on the Krusty Krabs roof and refuses to come down.

programme.title: Odd Squad

programme.desc: Online gamers Yammy and Slogo give gaming masterclasses on `Minecraft and `Roblox.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: An AI accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life.

programme.title: Winx Club: The Magic Is Back
programme.desc: The Winx plan a day of adventure in Magixia, but Griseldas restrictions and an incomplete project keep them grounded, until Robin helps them sneak away.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve is in Australia with an ocean dragon, snakes and the deadliest spider on earth.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Emily and Stephanie have trouble adjusting to their new dance captain, Michelle. Riley promises to go on a date with James if he improves his test scores.

programme.title: Shark Bites
programme.desc: Steve Backshall meets the hammerhead shark, a shark with some seriously super senses. He heads to his shark lab to reveal how their bizarrely shaped head allows them to detect electrical fields given off by their prey.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: It is a spooky night in Vegesaur Valley. Ginger and the Pea-Rexes are excited for forest treats.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its a windy day and Bing wants to fly his Hoppity Voosh kite with Flop. And he wants to do it all by himself. Even when Pando arrives and wants to help, Bing insists on doing it his way. When the kite gets caught up in the park bench, Bing realises that there are some times when another pair of hands comes in handy.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po finds a teddy bear in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po excitedly show the teddy to the Tiddlytubbies and they all love it very much.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the rock `n roll star Parsley performing Rise Up with Me about all things rock.

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee accidently marks Mos newly cleaned carpet. Uh oh!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sulas cousin Nicky is visiting, something Bing is a little unsure about. Sula and Bing start making rippy pictures, and while Sula is looking for some purple paper Bing shows Nicky how to voosh the blue speedy car down the slide. However, Nicky vooshes too, falling and breaking his glasses! Sula is furious and Bing is forlorn. Amma soothes Bing while Nicky shows him that he can click his glasses back together again.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: The Colourblocks meet a new animal, but arent sure what colour it is. Learn about a creature that can change colour with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is getting ready to harvest the ripe crops that have grown. The squirrels remember when they planted their seeds, watered them, and left them to grow, and now its time to help Duggee pick them all.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to join in. When its Norries turn she cant find the paint colour she wants. But Duggee has his Colour Badge, he can mix colours together to make new ones!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey needs some assistance drawing a dragon for a story she is working on, she asks her dad, Bandit, for help.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Follows the adventures of a Blue Heeler puppy, Bluey, who lives with her mum, dad, and sister. Her energy and lovable spirit gets her into all kinds of funny and unpredictable situations.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters have been invited by the Korowai tribe to visit their village in the rainforest of Papua in Indonesia. They are an ancient tribe who build their homes above the ground, safe from floods and insects, using everything around them in the forest. Meanwhile, Grandmaster Glitch is also in the rainforest, trying to build the tallest treehouse in the world. When he sees that the Korowais treehouse is even taller than his, he tries to get his even higher.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Stolen Firewood
programme.desc: When Peter, Lily and Benjamin go out to collect firewood, they soon find that not one but three predators are after some too. Can the rabbits stage a series of daring raids to retrieve it?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Kwazii is spooked when he spots what looks like a giant underwater spider! However, it turns out to be a very old Spider Crab who needs the Octonauts help.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Fives new smoothie cafe is open! Can the Numberblocks get the orders right?

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: When the band are too ill to play in the show, The Three Bears step in to help.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Love Monster attempts to face his fear of loud noises so he can enjoy the fireworks.

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch needs some help from the Playtimers to make hoopy owl bagels. Its time for a tasty adventure!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing finds his old baby shoes. They are much too small for Bing now, but Coco loves them and so does baby Charlie. When they fit Charlie, Bing has a hard time letting them go to a new home until Charlies first steps help Bing to realise they will be more use to someone whose feet are the right size.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `p and goes on an adventure featuring popcorn, pizza, and a pyjama party. The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu and Biba find toy blueberries at playtime and decide to play a treasure hunt game. When Declan joins the game, he realises that they rigged it.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Brian asks the Piggies to help him grow a very special little plant. They nurture it as their pet plant, and it grows - so much that they can no longer keep it at home. Parting with their beloved plant feels impossible.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos see a man putting something inside his tent, and they get carried away putting more and more things inside. Meanwhile, Peekaboo has managed to get stuck inside the teapot. Can Peekaboo get out without being spotted by the Twirlywoos?

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin is down on the farm with his friends where they meet a chicken, find some eggs and get creative. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble finds a wiggly worm in Grandad Tumbles garden.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubby Custard Machine careers crazily out of Home Dome and goes on a messy ride around Teletubbyland with all four Teletubbies on board.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Sullivan, Araiya, River, Taiba, Luna and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. All the parents and babies have different objects and toys that are themed around a trip to the shops.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri and Lou get in a sticky situation when they seek honey for Anaheras sore throat.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Dad struggles to get Maddie to brush her teeth before bed, but a musical visit from her all singing and dancing pearly whites has everyone brushing in perfect harmony.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Road worker Dylan must find a way to help drivers when a little pothole becomes a big roadblock.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Missy take to the high seas and play pirates on the hammock swing, but theyll need to gather all their courage to take on storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When the Squirrels cant figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea. A mobile library. The Squirrels set off with Duggee. Along the way, they help Tino find his creativity, King Tiger figure out his favourite ice cream flavour and Worm find her love of fantasy. The Squirrels learn just how helpful and informative a library can be.

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn, from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Grapefruit dedicating the song All My Friends to the close pals who go with her everywhere.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Nestling in gently rolling hills is Timmys nursery school, cosily housed in old farm buildings. Complete with messy play area, story corner and garden, its the perfect place for a lamb to find his place in the world.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: The school is having a very special lantern parade, so each child gets to make their very own lantern with their face on. Oliver and Felicity are making theirs with help from Mrs Collins. They use a milk bottle for the body, pipe cleaners for arms and coloured paper for clothes, then they add a photo of their face. Once the lanterns have been made, the children hang them on a wire in the playground ready for the parade.

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook
programme.desc: Childrens cookery series with Big Cook Jen and Little Cook Small. Jen is birdwatching on a kitchen safari, while Small guesses which birds and animals they can see. Eric the Explorer visits the cafe for something to eat, so they cook him something exciting and unusual, just like the things Eric discovers in the wild.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
programme.desc: To be advised.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Swimmer Maisie, a Paralympic gold medallist, explains how her swimming cap helps her to go faster.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Disability assistance dog Tinks and her owner Charli have a long list of chores to do, all in time for Annabel, their last minute visitor!

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie finds out how really tall buildings are made out of steel and concrete. She visits a skyscraper construction site to explain how the concrete columns that are buried deep into the ground help to make it strong and stable. Then Maddie uses a special 360 camera to see all around her from the top floor. Next Maddie is finding out how birds fly.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `tree and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of trees: a small tree, a red tree, a white tree and a lighting-up-at-night tree! Theres a prickly tree, a tickly tree and even a friendly family of trees.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Three opens a stampoline park, where her friends have splatty fun making inky prints of all the shapes they can make.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: With a dressing up box it must be showtime! B, O and X discover a dressing up box that is filled with everything they need to put on a performance of Sleeping Beauty, except for something to sleep on.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Go wants to surprise Toad with a colourful pattern tower, but she needs Artys help.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Red is surprised to discover that shes not the only colour in the world when she meets Blue. Join the Colourblocks to learn which objects can be red and which can be blue, and how some can be both red and blue.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is a big, friendly dog who runs The Squirrel Club, an after-school activity club where children can learn and take part in all kinds of activities, have fun adventures, and earn badges for their achievements.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: TapTap becomes very protective when strange eggs appear in the branches of her tree, so everyone helps keep the garden nice and quiet. TapTap is amazed to find that her eggs are in fact chrysalises, from which some beautiful musical butterflies emerge!

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friend go to the library and finish their day with a treat in the library cafe. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble uses his imagination by playing library with the toys.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: After a fun waving game with the Tiddlytubbies, the Teletubbies enjoy watching children waving as they set off on a short boat trip. Finally, the Teletubbies wave to the Tiddlytubbies, who are off to sleepybyes.

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Andy sets off on another time travelling adventure after an accident at the museum ruins his new prehistoric exhibit. Arriving 150 million years in the past he tracks down the peculiar camptosaurus and plays hide and seek with a fierce allosaurus.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: When Jess takes Evie for her first school visit, Waffle goes along too, on the condition that he doesnt sing. He tries his best to behave, but its hard for a Wonder Dog! On their walk to school, Jess and Evie bump into Connie Lester and her daughter Ruby. Ruby reveals that she will also be starting at Sommersby School too, in the year above Evie. Ruby enjoys stroking Waffle and tells Evie that she loves animals. She has a pet dog of her own, Jelly, a yellow labrador.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Mummys away and Dads going to play football, so Grandma comes over to babysit Topsy and Tim. Before the twins go to bed, Grandma lets them bath Mossy the dog! Its messy and lots of fun.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?
programme.desc: Charlie, the youngest person to ever cycle around the world, explains why he loves wearing his cycling helmet.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused - they only come because there are worried about their friend.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on an ancient Greek planet to play jump the rubber band.

Isla, Otto and Jud bake some delicious tiger ginger biscuits, using coloured icing for roar-some decorations. programme.title: Chopper

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay tries to transform El Cantito, a Puerto Rican restaurant, that is struggling to keep the business afloat with malfunctioning equipment, a small staff and pandemic-induced financial strain.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This documentary takes viewers inside the doors of Thornhill Community Academy near Dewsbury, highlighting what happens in the secondary school. Through highlighting the diverse institution, almost exactly half White British and half British-Asian, `Educating Yorkshire provides an insight into modern school life in the UK as it follows head teacher Jonny Mitchell, who tries to build upon recent improvements in exam results among the schools students. The programme also explores the universal themes of teenage life and the student-teacher relationships that are important in a young persons formative years.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Simon White and friend and neighbour Shirley Boyle are first to host at The Old Hall Country House in the picturesque village of Madeley in Cheshire. On arrival most of the guests are awed by the historical 16th century BandB. In the afternoon, Simon and Shirley take their guests tap dancing and in keeping with the five-star luxury to a private fine dining restaurant for dinner.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Following the accidental death of his parents, Abbas Khan inherits the entire wealth estate and property. The police feel that his situation is vulnerable, as they suspect his parents death was not accidental. They arrange for a full-time personal bodyguard in the shape and form of Inspector Rajveer Singh. After a series of misadventures, the child takes a liking to Rajveer, and so does the childs parents secretary.

programme.title: Khoobsurat

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Hundreds of cameras capture Hurricane Ida as the Category 4 storm slams the Louisiana coast in 2021, but when the superstorm shifts to the Northeast, eyewitnesses film harrowing encounters with tornadoes and flooding all the way to New York City.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa

programme.desc: Ina is cooking with herbs and sharing tips for turning up the flavour; she incorporates rosemary, oregano and mint in pork souvlaki with radish tzatziki and pitas for dinner; dill, chives and basil shine in heirloom tomatoes with herbed ricotta.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel Slater looks at how spicy flavours work so well with something cooling. From a classic chicken curry to a spicy tomato stew with yoghurt, Nigel shares some of his favourite dishes, and to prove just how versatile this food pairing is, he cooks up a new version of a traditional pudding. Nigel also travels to Bristol to meet a man who is passionate about pepper.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel Slater continues his exploration of brilliant culinary combinations, this time turning his attention to texture. Success in the kitchen is not just about tastes and flavours; contrasting textures can really lift a dish. He makes a classic savoury pie with a puff pastry crust, and a reworking of his favourite childhood pudding: poached pears.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James continues his British adventure in Lancashire with top local chef Lisa Allen in the passenger seat of his trusty red mini. Their first stop is an incredible food hall in Lisas home town of Clitheroe. Here they shop and then cook together a fantastic BBQd john dory with kohlrabi and fennel salad. Next, Lisa is in the driving seat as she takes the mini to a local buffalo farm where theyre producing some interesting cheese from buffalo milk.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James adventure brings him over the border into North Wales, where hes joined by chef Stephen Terry for this leg of his journey. Their first stop is the grand Pale Hall, where head chef Gareth Stevenson is cooking up a real treat - Moroccan-inspired Welsh lamb. James offers his own variation of Welsh lamb in the grounds of the hall, serving with gnocchi and vegetables. Next, one of James boyhood dreams comes true as he has the ultimate falconry experience.

programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Paul Martins Way Out West tour takes them to deepest Dorset, Devon, Somerset and beyond. Antiques experts and firm friends, our pair share a common goal: to make big profits at the auction in Worcestershire. Along the way, Paul ditches the classic car to investigate the obscure, Somerset-based Victorian inventor of unmanned powered flight, before having a go at a bit of modern model aeronautics himself.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It is the final leg of our journey with veteran tripper Raj Bisram and relative rookie Paul Martin. After an epic tour of the south and south west, their shopping and saleroom extravaganza concludes at a Palladian mansion in the Cotswolds. The open-topped classic car transports our duo to Shakespeare country, Warwickshire, where dealer Paul and auctioneer Raj hope to acquire anything going for a sonnet. They find out about alpacas and llamas, and discover the historical roots of ballet.

programme.desc: Theon incites his men to action; Luwin offers advice; Brienne silences Jaime; Arya receives a gift; Dany goes to a strange place; Jon proves himself.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: When John Basilone falls for the beautiful Lena, the couple must come to terms with his departure to Iwo Jima.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: The politicians want arrests, but McNulty holds out, desperate for a wire-tap to get hard evidence against the Barksdale outfit. Meanwhile, Omar decides to testify after seeing the body of his murdered lover.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony is forced to discuss living arrangements with Livia, then has a series of `fever dreams after he gets sick at a restaurant.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The FBI make plans to wiretap the Soprano family home, and Patsy begins asking questions regarding the death of his twin brother.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: With the help of Ciro, Enzo launches new operations in Naples. However, the traffic does not go unnoticed by the citys existing bosses.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Enzo and his crew are under attack, but Ciro advises caution before retaliating. Plus, Genny approaches Scianel to help finance his own war.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Enzo and his crew are under attack, but Ciro advises caution before retaliating. Plus, Genny approaches Scianel to help finance his own war.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Sing is a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alleys residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs. Bizarro League
programme.desc: Superman, Batman and the rest of the Justice League team up with the Bizarro League to defeat Darkseid.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy and his plucky pals go on a forest adventure in his fathers latest invention, the Reptar Wagon.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man struggles to find a better life for his family while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Freuds Last Session
programme.desc: On the eve of World War II, Sigmund Freud and C.S. Lewis gather to discuss the existence of God and the future of mankind.

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: After being released from rehab, Riley struggles to navigate the line between love and a new addiction.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool
programme.desc: Based on Richard Russos novel of an immature 60-year-old and the people in his orbit in an upstate New York town.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: After being released from rehab, Riley struggles to navigate the line between love and a new addiction.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Following another successful mission, International Rescue faces a crisis when its space station, Thunderbird 5, is damaged by a suspected meteor strike. However, criminal mastermind Aristotle Spode, aka the Hood, is waiting for the team to vacate their secret island base so that he can take control and learn more about their operation.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: Mob Land
programme.desc: In a small town struggling with addiction, a local sheriff tries to maintain the peace when desperate family man Shelby robs a pill mill. The supposedly easy score takes a violent turn, alerting the New Orleans mafias revenge-seeking enforcer.

programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.
