programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the homes past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gravity

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome, a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films. Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenbergs early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: An Oracle visits Atlantis, informing the team that Wraith hive ships are heading in their direction. With forewarning, the team hope to be able to stop them once again. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Rights of Man (Except for Howard)
programme.desc: Hobbo decides that the still-homeless Howard needs to show Pearl whos boss, but after Pearl slams the door in his face, Howard is despondent. Hobbo is insistent that Howard just needs to remind Pearl of the good times, but will his bicycle skills be enough to win her back? Meanwhile, Marina helps Miss Davenport upgrade her appearance, and decides to seize the moment with Mr Waddle.

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!
programme.desc: Joe Maplin decrees that every Thursday will be `sunshine smile day. The camp host decides to extend this to the campers by compelling a holidaymaker caught without a smile to pay a shilling to the Campers Amenity Fund.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright leaves his shop for a few hours to attend the funeral of a friend. Unfortunately, his thrifty nature doesnt allow him to buy a proper wreath but one the size of a button-hole.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Hobbo and his `team turn Howard into a tramp to show Pearl how rough hes been living and convince her to take him back. The men pitch him a tent but Howards isnt keen and goes for a meal with Glenda and Barry. The men return to the camp with Howard to show Pearl how much hes roughing it, but Marina arrives at the same time and Hobbo and Howard bundle her into the tent.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Glenda sends a reluctant Barry off to paint a nice view, to take his mind off wanting to eat. Meanwhile, the dejected Howard wonders if Pearl still loves him. Hobbo takes pity on him. Hobbo delivers a message from Howard to Pearl - a brief peck - but Pearl grabs him and delivers a full-blooded kiss. Howard is aghast. Elsewhere, Glenda tells the uncertain Morton that hes going to Glorias wedding as Morias guest.

programme.desc: Rodders feels its time to go it alone, but Del and Grandad arent so sure, particularly when Rodney teams up with his mate Mickey Pearce and sets up in competition with Del.

programme.desc: Dels latest foolproof scheme for making millions, game fishing, backfires when events take an unusual turn.

programme.desc: To Rodney and Grandads consternation, Del flirts with the antiques business. When he is seduced by an attractive smooth operator, a family rift ensues.

programme.sub-title: May the Force Be With You

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Things have gone so well for the Trotters that Del and Rodney decide to treat Uncle Albert to a surprise birthday party. And Rodney has a night on the town with a date, but things dont quite go according to plan.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Del, Rodney and Uncle Albert take their mates from the Nags Head on a disastrous day trip to Margate. A worried Cassandra is none too happy at Rodney joining the party having just celebrated their first anniversary.

programme.title: Blackadder: The Lost Pilot
programme.desc: Sir Tony Robinson takes a journey back in time to find out where Blackadder really began, and to uncover the story of the previously-unseen pilot episode.

programme.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You ... With Alan Partridge
programme.desc: With Britains Olympic womens hurdles relay team of 1936.

programme.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You ... With Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Alan Partridge presents a special French edition of the show `live from Paris, with co-host Nina Vanier, the French Sue Lawley. Guests include fashion dame Yvonne Boyd.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Sgt. Dawkins spends her free time protesting against a new road, and Constable Goody falls in love.

programme.desc: With Britains Olympic womens hurdles relay team of 1936.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Sgt. Dawkins spends her free time protesting against a new road, and Constable Goody falls in love.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is on the last leg of his railway journey from the train-building city of Derby to the aircraft manufacturing base of Filton. From Tewkesbury, he heads to the fairytale castle of Eastnor at the foot of the Malvern Hills.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael takes a pot shot at the sport of kings at a country estate, where the king dallied with his mistress. He learns the ropes aboard an Edwardian wherry on the Norfolk Broads and joins variety performers to tap dance on Cromer Pier. In Cambridge, he investigates the student days of the young Prince of Wales and the novelist, E. M. Forster, author of `Howards End.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Letchworth Garden City to Herne Hill
programme.desc: Michael joins a garden party where a fourth generation citizen of Letchworth introduces him the citys community spirit. Heading into the capital, Michael discovers a favoured haunt of King Edward VII and samples the monarchs favourite tipple, the Kings Ginger, invented to keep him warm in his horseless carriage.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his Edwardian Bradshaws guide, Michael Portillo arrives in West Croydon, where he uncovers a once-celebrated, now forgotten,mixed-race composer with an uncannily familiar name. With the modern British rail network now half the size of the Edwardian one, Michael is delighted to discover a railway renaissance in Three Bridges.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek picks up an impressive five vehicle haul from a collector who can no longer look after his motors. Pauls out on the road too - hes collecting a rare 1972 Lancia Fulvia Berlina.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave picks up a 1970s Alfa Romeo that once starred in a chocolate advert. Meanwhile, Derek casts his eye over a Citroen 2CV before becoming distracted by a treasure trove of more than 270 motorbikes in the same garage.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Nazis and the Final Solution
programme.desc: This final episode reveals the fate of many of the SS and former prisoners of Auschwitz in the last days of the war and its immediate aftermath.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team makes a return visit to Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral, where fascinating finds include a miniature piano with a secret, a sketch by LS Lowry and a mysterious chest found bricked up in the crypt.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The show visits Belton House in Lincolnshire where surprising finds include a collection of Chairman Mao memorabilia from China, a funeral standard believed to have been snatched from Oliver Cromwells coffin and a purse that hides a secret weapon.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1969 Morris Mini Cooper MkII is totally restored by specialists. They give it the full works, which means only one thing... any chance of profit heads towards an open window.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team set out on a Pre-War challenge with a 1939 three wheeled Morgan F4 - and aptly named Russ Storer from MG Mecca is still keen to take it on.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Nazis and the Final Solution
programme.desc: This final episode reveals the fate of many of the SS and former prisoners of Auschwitz in the last days of the war and its immediate aftermath.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team makes a return visit to Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral, where fascinating finds include a miniature piano with a secret, a sketch by LS Lowry and a mysterious chest found bricked up in the crypt.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: The second leg of the journey sees Simon dodge the Moroccan secret police in Western Sahara, travel on one of the worlds longest trains in Mauritania, visit a forgotten refugee camp in the Algerian desert where more than 100,000 people live, and take a swim in a Libyan oasis with a government minder who bears an uncanny resemblance to Colonel Gadaffi.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: The time has come to say `Adieu, Adieu! as Rene, his lovely wife Edith and all the regulars finally bow out at the close of the war.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Replaced at work by a box, Victor embarks on his enforced retirement. As an erstwhile security officer, he finds it exasperatingly difficult to adapt to this directionless new existence, and he begins magnifying mundane aspects of everyday life into major dramas.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Margaret tries to help her husband cope with early retirement by getting him a book from the library entitled `Coping with Old Age. Maybe keep-fit classes at the local adult education centre will help take Victors mind off the depressing turn of events?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team fly the flag for King and country with one of their most luxurious purchases to date - a 1981 Rolls Royce Silver Spirit.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Theres an unlikely arrival at the North Yorkshire car auction - an Argentinian Army Mercedes G wagon that saw action in the Falklands War.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. Some stained glass and a Victorian hay rack are among this programmes finds.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring a luxury resort that conceals a top-secret facility, a mysterious complex in Bali struck by disaster, and a relic of hope near Jerusalem.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On an epic railway journey from Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh to Kolkata in West Bengal, Michael Portillo uses his Bradshaws 1913 Handbook of Indian, Foreign and Colonial Travel, published when the British Raj was fifty-five years old, to chart a course through Indias history from the days of The East India Company to the dawn of independence.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Bioscopewala
programme.desc: The story of Rehmat Khan, a man from Kabul, who used to show films to children through his Bioscope.

programme.title: Pyar Koi Khel Nahin
programme.desc: After a chance, pre-arranged meeting, Nisha and Sunil meet, fall in love, marry and move in with Sunils wealthy family.

programme.title: Madam Chief Minister
programme.desc: A feisty woman encounters political corruption at every level as she embarks on a journey to becoming the chief minister of Uttar Pradesh.

programme.title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
programme.desc: A man realises that he loves his childhood friend and tries to stop her upcoming wedding.

programme.title: The Zoya Factor
programme.desc: Sonam Kapoor stars as Zoya, a young and successful advertising executive who becomes the good luck charm for Indias cricket team during the World Cup. Based on the book by Anuja Chauhan of the same title.

programme.title: Dhoom
programme.desc: A gang of robbers on hi-tech motorbikes, led by the charismatic Kabir, is sweeping through Mumbai, outwitting the police at every turn. When officer Jai Dixit is assigned to catch the criminals, he reluctantly enlists the help of garage mechanic and bike enthusiast Ali. Though the pair do not see eye-to-eye at first, they soon become a formidable team, tracking their enemies from the streets of Mumbai to the beaches of Goa.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: An Indian living in the US decides to visit his home town with his new wife and, despite the family suggestions, they insist in staying at the ancestral home.

programme.title: Gharwali Baharwali
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is cheating on him so he decides to re-marry and keep a second wife who will fulfil his long-term ambitions of becoming a father.

programme.title: Gharwali Baharwali
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is cheating on him so he decides to re-marry and keep a second wife who will fulfil his long-term ambitions of becoming a father.

programme.desc: After marrying Kartik Goenka, Naira tries to manage her roles as a wife and daughter-in-law with equal aplomb, but she faces many challenges and struggles to overcome them.

programme.desc: Embracing love above all, strong-willed Saas-Bahus keep the Viranis together. But when conspirators try to create a rift, will their familial bond prevail?
